name: WindyTrees
0:
”Alexa open Windy Trees”
”Alexa ask Windy Trees to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: windy trees
des:
Experience the soothing rustle of leaves as the wind blows through trees with this skill. It provides a dynamic and refreshing natural sound, ideal for those looking to bring the peacefulness of a breezy day into their living space or to create a calming background ambiance.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Windy Trees
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
